sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import styles from './Card.module.scss' import ContentLoader from "react-content-loader" function Card({onFavorite, title,price, imageUrl, onPlus, favorite= false, id, added=false, loading = false}) { const [isAdded, setIsAdded] = React.useState(added) const [isFollow, setIsFollow] = React.useState(favorite) const onClickPlus = () =>{ onPlus({id, title, price, imageUrl}) setIsAdded(!isAdded) } const onClickFollow = () => { onFavorite({id, title, price, imageUrl}) setIsFollow(!isFollow) } return (
loading ? <>
{title}
Цена: {price} руб.
:
) } export default Card
